sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今天的温度是零下五度。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān de wēndù shì líng xià wǔ dù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La température aujourd'hui est de moins cinq degrés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Today's temperature is minus five degrees.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bāng wǒ kāi yīxià mén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: S'il te plaît, ouvre-moi la porte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please help me open the door.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ néng bāngmáng ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Peux-tu aider ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Can you help?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ shénme shíhou lái wǒ jiā?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quand viens-tu chez moi ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: When are you coming to my house?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yào hē chá háishi kāfēi?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veux-tu boire du thé ou du café ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Do you want to drink tea or coffee?

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我每天坐公共汽车去上班。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān zuò gōnggòng qìchē qù shàngbān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je prends le bus pour aller au travail chaque jour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I take the bus to work every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ jiào shénme míngzì?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Comment t'appelles-tu ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is your name?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ tīngjiàn le ma? Yǒu rén qiāo mén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu as entendu ? Quelqu'un frappe à la porte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Did you hear? Someone is knocking on the door.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nà zhī māo zài shuìjiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce chat est en train de dormir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: That cat is sleeping.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng děng wǒ yīxià, wǒ mǎshàng lái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Attends-moi un instant, j'arrive tout de suite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please wait for me a moment, I'm coming right away.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jīntiān chī de hěn shǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai très peu mangé aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I ate very little today.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng mǎi yī jiàn xīn yīfu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux acheter un nouveau vêtement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to buy a new piece of clothing.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个房间不大，但是很舒服。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège fángjiān bú dà, dànshì hěn shūfu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette pièce n'est pas grande, mais elle est confortable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This room is not big, but it's comfortable.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ néng bāng wǒ ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Peux-tu m'aider ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Can you help me?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shū zài zhuōzi xiàmiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le livre est sous la table.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The book is under the table.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xīnnián kuàilè!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bonne année !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Happy New Year!

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐngwèn xǐshǒujiān zài nǎlǐ?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Excusez-moi, où sont les toilettes ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Excuse me, where is the restroom?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yǒu sān gè hǎo péngyou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai trois bons amis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have three good friends.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yínháng zài yóujú de yòubiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La banque est à droite de la poste.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The bank is to the right of the post office.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ de rén hěn yǒuhǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les gens ici sont très amicaux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The people here are very friendly.
